column8: Stacks bleed after interrupts and boosts movement in lava slicks for Scoria Draw finale.
Grants water-walking after opening chests and increases dock faction reputation.
Neck relay that reduces slows and pings allies about incoming frost hazards.
Water stealth while stationary and better glowspore drops for the Chasm Singer finale.
Blocks add stacking nature shields and +5% rare herb yield during Crown of Rivers chain.
Poison-resist cloak that turns overheal into healing spore bursts for Matriarch's Oath.
Planted banner pulses fortify aura and boosts wall faction reputation options.
Halves fire damage while channeling and heals when extinguishing hazards in Emberfall chapter.
Reflects spell damage and reveals invisible foes after blocking for the Oathmirror quest.
Stacks sunder on armored foes and grants fire absorb while stationary for Clinkerbreaker route.
Shadow-resistant codex that reveals smuggling caches while stealthed for Nightwarden finale.
Extra crits on airborne foes and grants group sprint after kills during Skyline Run.
